turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 86-1845, Torres against Oakland Scavenger Company will be announced by Justice Marshall.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: This case is here on certiorari to the Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.
Here, we hold that failure to file a Notice of Appeal in compliance with the specificity requirement of Federal Rule of Appellate Procedure 3(c) presents a jurisdictional bar to that appeal.
The judgment of the Court of Appeals is therefore affirmed.
Justice Scalia has filed an opinion concurring in the judgment and Justice Brennan has filed a dissenting opinion.
